title: DOJ files reveal exactly how Jeffrey Epstein makes his coffee, full step-by-step guide inside
summary_full: Amid Jeffrey Epstein’s sprawling DOJ files, a surprisingly meticulous 2013 V60 coffee guide to his then-girlfriend reveals his precise taste and attention to detail. From exact grams, water temperature, and timed pours to curated subscriptions and starter kits, the documents show him as a coffee connoisseur, yet none of it changes the grim reality of his 2019 arrest and criminal legacy.
